snippet.title: Spire Horizon Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover a thrilling world of adventure in Spire Horizon, an RPG open world game, where you embody a skeleton protagonist, explore a visually stunning world, engage in battles against formidable enemies, and traveling in search of a beloved wife.

Spire Horizon on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2321880/Spire_Horizon/

Official Website: https://www.mendoka.com/

Follow me here! 
Discord: https://discord.gg/AmFFEHyHWq
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?developer=Mendoka
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100088861612335
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@mendokasan
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/mendokasan
Twitter: https://x.com/mendokasan
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mendokasan
Instragram: https://www.instagram.com/mendokasan/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Mendoka/

Support Us
